definition: to be mindful/to pay attention to/to take note of
to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: Q. So beware the tapping of the pen.
sentences.chinese: 因此要留意那支钢笔的敲击。

sentences.english: So you just have a lot of stuff to pay attention to, so.
sentences.chinese: 所以你有很多可以留意的事情，就这样。

sentences.english: There is also a hierarchy of offensiveness that needs to be observed.
sentences.chinese: 攻击性言语也分等级，这需要我们留意。

sentences.english: You should have heeded the words of the mahut God.
sentences.chinese: 你应当留意作为看守人形态的神所说的话。

sentences.english: Look for non-verbal signals when trying to determine whether someone is interested in you.
sentences.chinese: 当你决定对方否对你有意时，留意非语言性的讯号。

sentences.english: So, margin the reflection in her eye.
For Reference Only, please refer to HARTS notice from time to time.
sentences.chinese: 只供参考，请密切留意本会通告。

sentences.english: I am sorry. I was too shock to do so.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉，我当时惊吓过度以至于没有留意到。

sentences.english: We will update you our January 2010 speed dating event soon.
sentences.chinese: 我们即将公布2010年1月份速配活动，敬请留意。

sentences.english: Notice what happens when you think about him or her.
sentences.chinese: 留意当你想到他或她时发生了什么。

sentences.english: If you're on the look-out, you automatically start to notice opportunities.
sentences.chinese: 如果你留心，你就会下意识地留意各种机会。

sentences.english: Still the attire does has not paid attention actually already sees.
sentences.chinese: 依然装做没有留意其实早已看到。

sentences.english: Be alert for this opportunity if you want give someone a dose of happiness.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想给人一剂幸福，那就请请留意这种机会。

sentences.english: Use caution when deciding to ungroup a chart or table.
sentences.chinese: 决定取消组合图表或表格请留意。

sentences.english: And Jackie heed to jamie expression.
sentences.chinese: 而杰姬留意着杰米的表情。

sentences.english: Parents must, there- fore, keep an eye on what their children watch.
sentences.chinese: 因此，父母们应该留意孩子所看的电视节目。

definition: to be careful/to pay attention to
to take note of/to pay attention to
to remind/to call attention to/to warn of
to be on the alert/vigilant/alert/on guard/to warn
to point out/to remind (sb of sth)/to suggest/suggestion/tip/reminder/notice
to look over/to examine/to check up/to ferret out
